International students are a vital part of our communities and schools. It’s outrageous they are being threatened with deportation in the midst of a public health crisis. @DianneFeinstein and I are calling on @ICEgov to withdraw this despicable proposal immediately.

Public health experts agree: Forcing schools to reopen without providing them with the resources they need to do so safely is dangerous, reckless, and the last thing we should do.

https://www.nytimes.com/2020/07/10/us/politics/trump-schools-reopening.html

Financial help has not made it to the mom and pop shops at the heart of our communities. I’m talking about the nail salon and barbershop down the street.

@RepPressley and I are proposing a $125 billion fund for the smallest businesses that need help the most.

I’m proud of our @MassCCs, @MassDHE state universities, and @UMass schools for denouncing @ICEgov and @DHSgov’s policy to deport international students whose colleges move classes online. I’m in this fight alongside them all the way.
https://www.bostonglobe.com/2020/07/10/metro/mass-colleges-ask-immigration-authorities-allow-international-students-stay/
